ViewObject.Name: OD_ProjectNameNumberLOVVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT distinct PPA.PROJECT_ID ,PPA.NAME ,PPA.SEGMENT1 FROM Pa_Projects_All Ppa, Pa_Tasks Pt, Pa_Proj_Elements Ppe, Pa_Project_Statuses Pps, Pa_Proj_Elem_Ver_Schedule Ppvs, Pa_Projects_Erp_Ext_B Ppeb, Ego_Attr_Groups_V Eag, Fnd_Application fa WHERE Ppa.Project_Id = Pt.Project_Id And Pt.Task_Id = Ppe.Proj_Element_Id And Ppe.Status_Code = Pps.Project_Status_Code and pps.status_type = 'TASK' -- commented as to show all status AND pps.project_status_name = 'Not Started' and ppe.object_type='PA_TASKS' and ppa.attribute_category = 'Private Brand' AND nvl(ppa.attribute10,'No') = 'Yes' AND ppa.enabled_flag = 'Y' and ppa.template_flag = 'N' And Pt.Task_Id = Ppvs.Proj_Element_Id and pt.project_id = ppvs.project_id and ppeb.attr_group_id = eag.attr_group_id and eag.attr_group_name = 'PB_GEN_INFO' and eag.application_id = fa.application_id and fa.application_short_name = 'PA' AND PPEB.PROJECT_ID = PPA.PROJECT_ID
